fr: Here is your first enemy encounter [color=red]the CIH Virus[/color].
The CIH Virus, also known as [i]Chernobyl[/i], was a devastating malware from the late '90s. It could corrupt system files and even erase entire hard drives.
In this simulation, it represents [b]data corruption[/b], preventing you from progressing. If it touches you, it will "corrupt" your system.

[center][b]Controls Tutorial[/b][/center]
- Move carefully to avoid its reach.

[center][b]Controls Tutorial[/b][/center]
- Press [b]Z[/b] to zoom out and see your environment[br][br]
